entries.name: koldosTombCompleted
entries.text: NPC says "You've completed koldosTomb2 and you're all done."

children.name: itMe
children.text: It is I, a weary explorer.

entries.name: dedricsDoorCompleted
entries.text: NPC says "You've completed dedricsDoor but not koldosTomb2"

children.name: umm
children.response: Don't "ummm" me. Why are you here? Can you not see that I am busy, working here, in my office, down in the Catacombs. It's not weird.

children.name: explain
children.text: I'm trying to help Dedric escape. He's locked in a dark room here and cannot free himself.
children.response: Well of course he's locked in a room. I'm the one that did it.

children.name: why
children.response: Because he had it coming. He's in cahoots with that Guard out front, and I don't trust him neither.

children.name: helpAnyway
children.response: Couldn't even if I wanted to. The spell cannot be undone by me. That's the best part of the spell.

children.name: whoIsGwenor
children.response: An Enchantress. But that complicates things. Let me think! [three minutes later] All right, tell you what. If you can answer this riddle correctly, I will help you get to Gwenor. If not, then you'll have to leave.

children.name: acceptRiddle
children.text: All right, let's have it then.
children.response: This thing all things devours; Birds, beasts, trees, flowers; Gnaws iron, bites steel; Grinds hard stones to meal; Slays king, ruins town, And beats high mountain down.

children.name: answer1
children.response: I could do all these things, but I choose not too. Incorrect!

children.name: answer2
children.response: Heh... I should almost give you a pass for this one. Almost. Be gone!

children.name: answer3
children.response: Is that a question? Never mind. You are correct! You may see Gwennor now.

children.name: itMe2
children.text: It is I, a weary explorer.
children.response: Wait, I think I know you. You're looking for that fabled sword!

children.name: thatMe
children.response: You may go. I have no interest in such things.
